snippet: The Fairchild group owns publications like Women’s Wear Daily and Footwear News.
abstract: Conde Nast announces sale of Fairchild Fashion Media to Penske Media for $100 million; Fairchild publishes group of trade publications, including Women's Wear Daily and Footwear News.
lead_paragraph: The Fairchild group owns publications like Women’s Wear Daily and Footwear News.

headline.main: Condé Nast to Sell Fairchild Fashion Media for $100 Million
headline.print_headline: Condé Nast to Sell Fairchild Fashion Media for $100 Million
